remarks: Lemma for ~ lgsquad .  Count the members of ` S ` with odd coordinates. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2015.)
statement:
lgseisen.1 $e |- ( ph -> P e. ( Prime \ { 2 } ) ) $.
lgseisen.2 $e |- ( ph -> Q e. ( Prime \ { 2 } ) ) $.
lgseisen.3 $e |- ( ph -> P =/= Q ) $.
lgsquad.4 $e |- M = ( ( P - 1 ) / 2 ) $.
lgsquad.5 $e |- N = ( ( Q - 1 ) / 2 ) $.
lgsquad.6 $e |- S = { <. x , y >. | ( ( x e. ( 1 ... M ) /\ y e. ( 1 ... N ) ) /\ ( y x. P ) < ( x x. Q ) ) } $.
lgsquadlem1 $p |- ( ph -> ( -u 1 ^ sum_ u e. ( ( ( |_ ` ( M / 2 ) ) + 1 ) ... M ) ( |_ ` ( ( Q / P ) x. ( 2 x. u ) ) ) ) = ( -u 1 ^ ( # ` { z e. S | -. 2 || ( 1st ` z ) } ) ) ) $.
$d M u x y z $.
$d N u x y z $.
$d P u x y z $.
$d Q u x y z $.
$d S u x y z $.
$d ph u x y z $.
